entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
